tp:docstring.p: An interface for connection managers that store account details internally. At the moment this consists only of storing an account's credentials, but other functionality may be added in the future.
Account objects representing accounts on a connection manager that implements this interface should implement the ExternalPasswordStorage.DRAFT interface.

tp:flags.name: Account_Flags
tp:flags.tp:docstring: A set of flags representing the status of the Account stored in the Connection Manager.

tp:flag.tp:docstring: The associated account has its authentication credentials (password) stored in the connection manager

tp:mapping.name: Account_Flags_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: A mapping from Account_Ids to account flags.

tp:docstring.p: The set of Accounts stored in this Connection Manager, and flags indicating their status.
Change notification for this property is provided by the standard D-Bus PropertiesChanged signal.

method.name: ForgetCredentials
method.tp:docstring: Clears any saved credentials associated with the specified Account_Id. Any other saved data related to the account will be unaffected.

arg.name: Account_Id
arg.tp:docstring: An account id as returned from Protocol.IdentifyAccount.

method.name: RemoveAccount
method.tp:docstring: Completely removes all data associated with an account from the connection manager's internal storage.

arg.name: Account_Id
arg.tp:docstring: An account id as returned from Protocol.IdentifyAccount.
